Metadata.title: Ivan Stepanian :: Freelance Full-Stack Data Engineer
Metadata.description: I'm Ivan Stepanian, freelance full-stack data engineer based in Paris, France. Passionate about problem-solving and product engineering, I help companies with big data, web development, and data scraping.

Index.subtitle: Passionate about problem-solving, business needs analysis, and product engineering, I am seeking new challenges.
Index.details: Versatile and rigorous, my skills range from data engineering (<pandas>Pandas</pandas>, <scala>Scala</scala>, <spark>Spark</spark>, <azure>Azure MLOps</azure>...) to full-stack web development (<react>React</react>, <nextjs>Next14</nextjs>, <nestjs>NestJS</nestjs>, <kubernetes>Kubernetes</kubernetes>...), giving me a 360° view of modern digital products.

data.title: Big Data
data.content: As a Big Data & Machine Learning engineer by training, I manage ETL pipelines with the Apache stack. I use Plotly and R for data visualization, and TF/Keras for ML.

web.title: Web Development
web.content: Full-Stack with Expo/React Native & NestJS, Next.js 14 (app directory with API Routes). Sensitive to UX/UI, I assist in designing modern & intuitive interfaces.

scraping.title: Scraping
scraping.content: Web data extraction with Scrapy & Selenium, analysis and transformation with pandas. Completed projects include B2B lead & product lists generation.

meta.title: Blog
meta.description: Ivan Stepanian: Stay up to date with my latest articles on data engineering & web development.
